name: Snek (Daniel Northam)
description:
Be a Snek Torment Humans Break Free

----------------------------------------------

Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a sentient snake? Well here's your chance! Destroy countless expensive item, put on a hat, drink coffee, and most importantly fling yourself into the air. 

----------------------------------------------

The controls couldn't be simpler - 

W-A-S-D for movement 

J for ragoll 

Left-Shift to sprint

Space to jump
